inclusion.criterion: Greater than 6 months post-mechanical or bioprosthetic mitral valve replacement or mitral valve repair (quadrangular resection, triangular resection, sliding plasty, and/or annuloplasty) surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Dyspnea at rest or with exertion (NYHA II, III, or IV) [Symptomatic Study Group]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Asymptomatic control group meeting criteria 1 and 2 above
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior chronic vasodilator therapy for pulmonary hypertension
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: HIV infection: Based on self-report /historical diagnosis
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, but remains symptomatic and is prepared to undergo surgery.
